Entertainments Contest
Hawkins Theatre, Papakura, Auckland, New Zealand [ (M) March Points, (S) Solo, Light Music (LM) & Public Appeal (PA) see Bands Detail ] Grant Sinclair: Entertainment
Sacred Item – Skinner Shield: 1st: North Shore Brass, 2nd: Waitakere Auckland Brass, 3rd: Dalewool Auckland Brass Major Work – Jim Carson Memorial Cup: 1st: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 2nd: Waitakere Auckland Brass, 3rd: North Shore Brass March – International Military Music Society Trophy: 1st: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 2nd: Waitakere and North Shore Brass, 3rd: Auckland City Brass Solo - Greg Moverley Memorial Trophy: Winner: John Lewis of Dalewool Auckland Brass
Light Music – The Open Challenge Cup: 1st: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 2nd: Waitakere and North Shore Brass, 3rd: Auckland City Brass Public Appeal – The Besson Trophy: 1st: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 2nd: Waitakere and North Shore Brass, 3rd: Auckland City Brass Aggregate – Kennerley Memorial: 1st: Dalewool Auckland Brass, 2nd: Waitakere Auckland Brass, 3rd: North Shore Brass
Oct. 26, 2015, 4:43 p.m. March 29, 2017, 9:30 a.m.
